archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1073
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be able to initiate a help call or chat from my logged in self service app, so that I don't have to navigate away from the app to get help

properties.value: SC: by integration with chat or specific function of the app to make a call Details of the chat/help solution needed - impact on DS and EP also

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
